sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"/hsf/img/auth-process.svg","alt":"Authorization Process"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"authorization-process"}}>{`Authorization Process`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"1-initiation"}}>{`1. Initiation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`REflex users initiate a pub/sub relationship through the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://reflex-ui.yodata.me/"}}>{`REflex AppStore`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../img/appstore-switch-ui.png","alt":null}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"2-authorization"}}>{`2. Authorization`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`REflex AppStore publishes {AuthorizeAction}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/AuthorizeAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/AuthorizeAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.example.com
Content-Type: application/ld+json

{
    "@context":   "https://context.yodata.io/yodata/realestate#",
    "type":       "AuthorizeAction",
    "agent":      "https://user.example.com/profile/card#me",
    "instrument": "https://appstore.example.com/profile/card#me",
    "object":     "https://user.example.com/inbox/",
    "recipient":  "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"3-subscription"}}>{`3. Subscription`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Application publishes SubscribeAction with actionStatus = PotentialActionStatus`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/SubscribeAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/SubscribeAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: user.example.com
Content-Type: application/ld+json

{
    "@context": "https://yodata.io/yodata/realestate#",
    "type": "SubscribeAction",
    "actionStatus": "PotentialActionStatus",
    "agent":  "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me",
    "object": "https://user.example.com/inbox/"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"4-confirmation"}}>{`4. Confirmation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`User verifies and acknowledges the subscription by publishing a SubscribeAction with actionStatus = CompletedActionStatus.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.example.com
Content-Type: application/ld+json

{
    "@context": "https://yodata.io/yodata/realestate#",
    "type": "SubscribeAction",
    "actionStatus": "ActiveActionStatus",
    "agent":  "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me",
    "object": "https://user.example.com/inbox/"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"deauthorization"}}>{`Deauthorization`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When a user revokes your application's their inbox, your application will receive a RejectAction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/RejectAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/RejectAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`type: RejectAction
agent: 'https://user.example.com/profile/card#me'
object: 'https://user.example.com/inbox/'
recipient: 'https://application.example.com/profile/card#me'
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Diagrams on this page generated by js-sequence and the following`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-sequence"}}>{`User->Application: 1. Intiation (WebUI)
User->Application: 2. Authorization {AuthorizeAction}
Application->User: 3. Subscription {SubscribeAction}
User->Application: 4. Confirmation {SubscribeAction}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
